item.title: 'NAMESPACED' CLAIMS IN KEYCLOAK
item.description: This is now built into Keycloak! Keyclock currently handles URI based claim names out of the box. Keycloak is an Open Source Identity and Access Management application that rivals top IAM SaaS products, including Auth0. Something that took me an inordinate amount of time was trying to add custom ‘namespaced’ claims to the Keycloak's access_token. Previously, I've used Auth0 as an IAM; adding a custom claim with Auth0 only worked with ‘namespaced’ claims — claims that were prefixed with a URL.
